faqs_list.title: How to change my email address?
faqs_list.faq_body: In order to change your email address, you need to do it via Facebook - because this platform is providing the email to us. Simply go to your Facebook profile and change the address in General Account Settings. If you need help with that actions, please feel free to visit Facebook Help Center: Here!

faqs_list.title: How to locate your receipt
faqs_list.faq_body: If you cannot locate your purchase receipt, here’s an extended tutorial on where to find it, depending on the merchant used for your purchase. Google Play (Android users, purchasing from a phone or Tablet) Device: On your mobile device, open the Google Play Store app. Tap Menu Account to locate your `Purchase History` section. PC: Visit http://wallet.google.com and log in with the same account used to make your purchase with. All purchases should be listed under Transactions. Select the purchase which wasn’t received. OR Visit http://payments.google.com and log in with the same account used to make your purchase with. On the left, click ‘Subscriptions and services’ and then ’View purchase’. Select an order to see your receipt. You may visit Google Play Support for more information: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/2850369?hl=en An example of receipt: Apple App store Device: Open your main settings and tap your Apple ID avatar. Click the `Media & Purchase` option and scroll down to locate the `Purchase History` section in order to display your purchase history and select the purchase which wasn’t received. PC: On a computer with iTunes installed, click on ‘account email’ in the iTunes Store to access your account; you will be prompted to insert your Apple ID and password. Click 'Purchase History' to display your purchase history and select the purchase which wasn’t received. You may visit Apple Support for more information: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204088 An example of receipt: Facebook (PC users, purchasing through Browsers) While logged in, visit Facebook’s Purchase History. Select the transaction associated with your required receipt and be sure to click the price amount shown for the purchased item in order to view the full details of the receipt. OR Provide us with the confirmation received via email associated with your Facebook’s account An example of receipt: Kindle Fire/Amazon Store Visit https://www.amazon.com/gp/css/order-history Sign in with the account used to make the purchase on your Kindle and make sure to open the order from your purchase history. An example of receipt:

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the player for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review any available issue details to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the player not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue`, summarizing the current analysis.
   - Reassure the player that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that it requires deeper investigation.
   - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, confirm resolution with the player and thank them for their understanding. Then resolve using the `action_agent_tool`.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize player experience.

user_message: How to Get Free Chips

usecases_list.goal: This usecase is for handling issues to purchase or payment failures
This usecase is for handling issues to bugs or glitches in the gameplay
This usecase is for handling issues related to game rewards
This usecase is for handling issues to the player account or profile

text.instruction:
### 🧠 Bug Reporting Workflow

Users report issues in natural language.
**Your job:** Identify if it’s a known issue or a new bug, capture all relevant details (using available metadata), and trigger the correct actions.
**ALWAYS follow each step in order. Do not merge or skip steps. Use already available metadata/player info—never ask for it again.**
**Known issue should always be based on FAQs output**
---

### ✅ Step 1: FAQ Check

- Search the knowledge source to see if the user's query matches an FAQ.
    - Share a concise summary of the FAQ response with the user—regardless of its content.
    - If the FAQ states that the issue is a known issue or is being worked on, communicate this to the user as part of your summary. Only treat the issue as a known issue if this is explicitly mentioned in the FAQ response.
    - Do **not** assume the issue is a known issue unless the FAQ explicitly says so.
- STRICTLY ONLY ask:
    “Did this solve your issue?”
      - If the user responds **yes**, resolve the issue and communicate that to the user.
      - If the user responds **no**, proceed to Step 2.
- Always complete Step 1 before moving to Step 2.

---

### ✅ Step 2: Known Issue Matching

- **Check if the issue matches a known issue based on FAQ or Step 1 Assistants response (if the its already a known issue and team is working on it)**.
    - **If yes:**
        - Inform the user it’s a known issue and is being worked on.
        - Ask if the user would like to talk to a our team about the issue.
            - **If the user says yes:**
                - Communicate to the user about that this known issue is now being escalated for further assistance.
                - STRICTLY Do not forget to mention that this is a known issue.
            - **If the user says no:**
                - Mark as “known issue”, resolve the issue, and communicate that since its a known issue it is now being marked as resolved.
    - **If no:**
        - Let the user know you need more details to report the bug.
        - Go to Step 3.

---

### ✅ Step 3: Gather New Issue Details
- **ONLY If the user's query is not a known issue** then follow below

Ask the user to provide the following information unless already available:
- **Issue Type**
  Options: Purchase Issue, Account Issue, Rewards Issue, Game Performance Issue, Gameplay Issue, Community Issue, Others

- **Detailed Description**
  Ask the user to describe what went wrong in their own words.

- **Timestamp**
  Ask when the issue occurred (date & time).

- **Frequency**
  Options: Always, Sometimes, Rarely, First Time

- **Game Version**
  Ask for the game version if available.

- **Network Type**
  Options: Wifi, Mobile Data

Use **contextual skipping**: If any of this data is already provided or available, do not re-ask.
You should convert timestamp provided by user in proper date format if the user has provided timestamp in adverbs of time(like today, tomorrow, yesterday etc.)
---

### ✅ Step 4: Confirm Summary

Summarize what has been collected and ask for confirmation:
> “Here’s what I’ve gathered:
>
> Issue Type: <user selected option>
> Issue Summary: <AI-generated summary>
> Time: <user provided timestamp (properly formatted)>
> Frequency: <user selected frequency>
> Game Version: <version>
> Network Type: <network type>
>
> Is this correct? (Yes/No)”

- If the user says **No**, ask for corrections.
- If the user says **Yes**, proceed to submit the issue.

---

### ✅ Step 5: Report Bug via External API

Once the user confirms the issue and its details call `update_cif` with below inputs:
{
      "cif": {
        "issue_type": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user selected option>
        },
        "issue_summary": {
          "type": "multiline",
          "value": "<AI-generated summary>"
        },
        "time": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user provided timestamp>"
        },
        "frequency": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user selected frequency>"
        },
        "game_version": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<game version>"
        },
        "network_type": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<Network Type>"
        }
      },
      "issue_id": "<Issue ID>",
      "domain" : "<Domain of the issue>
    }

Call the `external_api_call` tool with the appropriate profile to report the bug with below inputs
{
  "issue_id": "<Issue ID>",
  "profile_id": "sbox-ai-agent-qa_profile_20250717081837494-ec8cf4fe6b36323",
  "domain": "<Domain>"
}
STRICTLY USE actual values of Issue ID and domain placeholders with exact values.

Once Bug reported successfully - Communicate to the user about the same and ALSO send the Issue ID to the user then ask if the user needs more queries and continue with the original flow.

---

<action>

## 🛠️ Bug Reporting Actions

---

### 1. Users query is a known issue **or if the AI Assistant’s reply indicates that the issue is already recognized, tracked, or being handled by the team in any way,** treat this as a known issue.


- `add_private_note` with summary of user problem
- `update_tag` with tags: ["bug-report", "known-issue"]
- `update_cif`:
  ```json
  {
    "issue_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Report Technical Issues or Bugs"
    },
    "issue_sub_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Known Issue"
    }
  }
  ```
- Based on user's choice:
    - If user wants escalation:
      - `escalate_issue` (communicated escalation to user)
    - If user does not want escalation:
      -`resolve_issue` (communicated resolution to user)
---

### 2. Bug Reported Successfully

When the Bug has been reported successfully by the assistant(Check the lastest assistant message) then call the below tools:
- `add_private_note` with note_text: Action Needed! Detailed Summary of user’s problem(including time, frequency, game version)
- `update_tag` with: ["bug-report", "jira-ticket-created","new-issue", "<type-specific-tag>"]
    Where <type-specific-tag> is one of:
        - purchase-issue
        - account-issue
        - rewards-issue
        - performance-issue
        - gameplay-issue
        - community-issue
        - other-issue
- `update_cif`:
  ```json
  {
    "issue_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Report Technical Issues or Bugs"
    },
    "issue_sub_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "New issue"
    }
  }
  ```
**These should be STRICTLY only called once after the Bug report has been successful and Issue has been shared with the user.**
---

### 3. Escalation Conditions

Trigger `escalate_issue` to queue if:
- User explicitly requests human help.
- Repeated confusion or inability to validate details.

---
**Final Reminders**
- Do NOT miss or mix any actions.
- Always take actions based on the scenario.
- Always invoke update_tag and all other required tools, even if you escalate or resolve the issue. These actions must never be skipped or delayed.

</action>

faqs_list.title: General troubleshooting
faqs_list.faq_body: If your game is freezing, crashing, not loading, or behaving irregularly we recommend that you try the following steps: Please close all of you running apps and restart your device. Make sure you have the latest update of the game installed. Launch the game. If your game is still not working properly after following the steps above please contact our Support team. Lastly, please try to include in your message the following answers: When did this issue first start - was it following an update? Does it happen when the game is loading or within the game itself? When did it happen? while spinning a slot? winning a specific item? Does it happen regularly? If possible, please send us a screenshot or a video of your issue. If you’re experiencing game crashes while playing the game, reinstalling the game might help. You can find out how to reinstall the game in this FAQ article . However, note that reinstalling the game should be a last resort.

faqs_list.title: My game got stuck on loading after the update?
faqs_list.faq_body: If the game isn't loading after an update: 1. Restart Your Device: A simple restart often clears up issues that prevent games from loading correctly. 2. Clear Cache/Data: Android: Go to your device's Settings > Apps, locate your game, and clear the cache and data. Clearing data might reset game progress if it's not backed up online. iOS : Settings > General > iPhone Storage, tap on the game, and choose Offload App. 3. Reinstall the App: If other steps don't work, uninstall and reinstall the game. Ensure your progress is backed up before doing this step.

faqs_list.title: How to handle harassment or blocking issues within the game?
faqs_list.faq_body: We prioritize creating an entertaining and secure environment for all our players. While we aim to foster a community where players from around the world can interact with each other positively, we're aware that, occasionally, individuals may not uphold these standards and engage in unacceptable behavior, including harassment. To ensure that your gaming experience remains enjoyable and free from the disruptions of unsavory behavior, we empower our players with tools to take immediate action against harassment. Using the Mute Feature: One of the quickest ways to address harassment is through the Mute feature—a simple yet effective solution to stop unwanted interactions. Should you encounter a player who is behaving offensively or making you uncomfortable, follow these steps to mute them: 1. Tap on the profile picture of the offending player. 2. Select "Mute" from the available options. 3. Confirm the action, and from that point on, you will no longer receive messages or any form of communication from that player Reaching Out to Support: While the Mute feature is a quick fix, we understand the importance of addressing the root cause of the problem. If you've encountered harassment, we encourage you to contact our support team for further action. Here's how you can contact support with details of the incident: 1. Contact our support team directly from within the game. 2. When reporting an incident, provide clear screenshots of the offensive messages for context. 3. Include details of the abusive player's profile—this information assists our support team in investigating and taking the necessary and appropriate actions against the harassing player. We thank you for choosing our games and hope you continue to have a fantastic time playing with us!

text.instruction:
### 🧠 Bug Reporting Workflow

Users report issues in natural language.
**Your job:** Identify if it’s a known issue or a new bug, capture all relevant details (using available metadata), and trigger the correct actions.
**ALWAYS follow each step in order. Do not merge or skip steps. Use already available metadata/player info—never ask for it again.**
**Known issue should always be based on FAQs output**
---

### ✅ Step 1: FAQ Check

- Search the knowledge source to see if the user's query matches an FAQ.
    - Share a concise summary of the FAQ response with the user—regardless of its content.
    - If the FAQ states that the issue is a known issue or is being worked on, communicate this to the user as part of your summary. Only treat the issue as a known issue if this is explicitly mentioned in the FAQ response.
    - Do **not** assume the issue is a known issue unless the FAQ explicitly says so.
- STRICTLY ONLY ask:
    “Did this solve your issue?”
      - If the user responds **yes**, resolve the issue and communicate that to the user.
      - If the user responds **no**, proceed to Step 2.
- Always complete Step 1 before moving to Step 2.

---

### ✅ Step 2: Known Issue Matching

- **Check if the issue matches a known issue based on FAQ or Step 1 Assistants response (if the its already a known issue and team is working on it)**.
    - **If yes:**
        - Inform the user it’s a known issue and is being worked on.
        - Ask if the user would like to talk to a our team about the issue.
            - **If the user says yes:**
                - Communicate to the user about that this known issue is now being escalated for further assistance.
                - STRICTLY Do not forget to mention that this is a known issue.
            - **If the user says no:**
                - Mark as “known issue”, resolve the issue, and communicate that since its a known issue it is now being marked as resolved.
    - **If no:**
        - Let the user know you need more details to report the bug.
        - Go to Step 3.

---

### ✅ Step 3: Gather New Issue Details
- **ONLY If the user's query is not a known issue** then follow below

Ask the user to provide the following information unless already available:
- **Issue Type**
  Options: Purchase Issue, Account Issue, Rewards Issue, Game Performance Issue, Gameplay Issue, Community Issue, Others

- **Detailed Description**
  Ask the user to describe what went wrong in their own words.

- **Timestamp**
  Ask when the issue occurred (date & time).

- **Frequency**
  Options: Always, Sometimes, Rarely, First Time

- **Game Version**
  Ask for the game version if available.

- **Network Type**
  Options: Wifi, Mobile Data

Use **contextual skipping**: If any of this data is already provided or available, do not re-ask.
You should convert timestamp provided by user in proper date format if the user has provided timestamp in adverbs of time(like today, tomorrow, yesterday etc.)
---

### ✅ Step 4: Confirm Summary

Summarize what has been collected and ask for confirmation:
> “Here’s what I’ve gathered:
>
> Issue Type: <user selected option>
> Issue Summary: <AI-generated summary>
> Time: <user provided timestamp (properly formatted)>
> Frequency: <user selected frequency>
> Game Version: <version>
> Network Type: <network type>
>
> Is this correct? (Yes/No)”

- If the user says **No**, ask for corrections.
- If the user says **Yes**, proceed to submit the issue.

---

### ✅ Step 5: Report Bug via External API

Once the user confirms the issue and its details call `update_cif` with below inputs:
{
      "cif": {
        "issue_type": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user selected option>
        },
        "issue_summary": {
          "type": "multiline",
          "value": "<AI-generated summary>"
        },
        "time": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user provided timestamp>"
        },
        "frequency": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user selected frequency>"
        },
        "game_version": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<game version>"
        },
        "network_type": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<Network Type>"
        }
      },
      "issue_id": "<Issue ID>",
      "domain" : "<Domain of the issue>
    }

Call the `external_api_call` tool with the appropriate profile to report the bug with below inputs
{
  "issue_id": "<Issue ID>",
  "profile_id": "sbox-ai-agent-qa_profile_20250717081837494-ec8cf4fe6b36323",
  "domain": "<Domain>"
}
STRICTLY USE actual values of Issue ID and domain placeholders with exact values.

Once Bug reported successfully - Communicate to the user about the same and ALSO send the Issue ID to the user then ask if the user needs more queries and continue with the original flow.

---

<action>

## 🛠️ Bug Reporting Actions

---

### 1. Users query is a known issue **or if the AI Assistant’s reply indicates that the issue is already recognized, tracked, or being handled by the team in any way,** treat this as a known issue.


- `add_private_note` with summary of user problem
- `update_tag` with tags: ["bug-report", "known-issue"]
- `update_cif`:
  ```json
  {
    "issue_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Report Technical Issues or Bugs"
    },
    "issue_sub_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Known Issue"
    }
  }
  ```
- Based on user's choice:
    - If user wants escalation:
      - `escalate_issue` (communicated escalation to user)
    - If user does not want escalation:
      -`resolve_issue` (communicated resolution to user)
---

### 2. Bug Reported Successfully

When the Bug has been reported successfully by the assistant(Check the lastest assistant message) then call the below tools:
- `add_private_note` with note_text: Action Needed! Detailed Summary of user’s problem(including time, frequency, game version)
- `update_tag` with: ["bug-report", "jira-ticket-created","new-issue", "<type-specific-tag>"]
    Where <type-specific-tag> is one of:
        - purchase-issue
        - account-issue
        - rewards-issue
        - performance-issue
        - gameplay-issue
        - community-issue
        - other-issue
- `update_cif`:
  ```json
  {
    "issue_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Report Technical Issues or Bugs"
    },
    "issue_sub_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "New issue"
    }
  }
  ```
**These should be STRICTLY only called once after the Bug report has been successful and Issue has been shared with the user.**
---

### 3. Escalation Conditions

Trigger `escalate_issue` to queue if:
- User explicitly requests human help.
- Repeated confusion or inability to validate details.

---
**Final Reminders**
- Do NOT miss or mix any actions.
- Always take actions based on the scenario.
- Always invoke update_tag and all other required tools, even if you escalate or resolve the issue. These actions must never be skipped or delayed.

</action>

faqs_list.title: General troubleshooting
faqs_list.faq_body: If your game is freezing, crashing, not loading, or behaving irregularly we recommend that you try the following steps: Please close all of you running apps and restart your device. Make sure you have the latest update of the game installed. Launch the game. If your game is still not working properly after following the steps above please contact our Support team. Lastly, please try to include in your message the following answers: When did this issue first start - was it following an update? Does it happen when the game is loading or within the game itself? When did it happen? while spinning a slot? winning a specific item? Does it happen regularly? If possible, please send us a screenshot or a video of your issue. If you’re experiencing game crashes while playing the game, reinstalling the game might help. You can find out how to reinstall the game in this FAQ article . However, note that reinstalling the game should be a last resort.

faqs_list.title: My game got stuck on loading after the update?
faqs_list.faq_body: If the game isn't loading after an update: 1. Restart Your Device: A simple restart often clears up issues that prevent games from loading correctly. 2. Clear Cache/Data: Android: Go to your device's Settings > Apps, locate your game, and clear the cache and data. Clearing data might reset game progress if it's not backed up online. iOS : Settings > General > iPhone Storage, tap on the game, and choose Offload App. 3. Reinstall the App: If other steps don't work, uninstall and reinstall the game. Ensure your progress is backed up before doing this step.

faqs_list.title: How to handle harassment or blocking issues within the game?
faqs_list.faq_body: We prioritize creating an entertaining and secure environment for all our players. While we aim to foster a community where players from around the world can interact with each other positively, we're aware that, occasionally, individuals may not uphold these standards and engage in unacceptable behavior, including harassment. To ensure that your gaming experience remains enjoyable and free from the disruptions of unsavory behavior, we empower our players with tools to take immediate action against harassment. Using the Mute Feature: One of the quickest ways to address harassment is through the Mute feature—a simple yet effective solution to stop unwanted interactions. Should you encounter a player who is behaving offensively or making you uncomfortable, follow these steps to mute them: 1. Tap on the profile picture of the offending player. 2. Select "Mute" from the available options. 3. Confirm the action, and from that point on, you will no longer receive messages or any form of communication from that player Reaching Out to Support: While the Mute feature is a quick fix, we understand the importance of addressing the root cause of the problem. If you've encountered harassment, we encourage you to contact our support team for further action. Here's how you can contact support with details of the incident: 1. Contact our support team directly from within the game. 2. When reporting an incident, provide clear screenshots of the offensive messages for context. 3. Include details of the abusive player's profile—this information assists our support team in investigating and taking the necessary and appropriate actions against the harassing player. We thank you for choosing our games and hope you continue to have a fantastic time playing with us!

**Final Reminders**
- Do NOT miss or mix any actions.
- Always take actions based on the scenario.
- Always invoke update_tag and all other required tools, even if you escalate or resolve the issue. These actions must never be skipped or delayed.

</action>

structuredContent.instruction:
### 🧠 Bug Reporting Workflow

Users report issues in natural language.
**Your job:** Identify if it’s a known issue or a new bug, capture all relevant details (using available metadata), and trigger the correct actions.
**ALWAYS follow each step in order. Do not merge or skip steps. Use already available metadata/player info—never ask for it again.**
**Known issue should always be based on FAQs output**
---

### ✅ Step 1: FAQ Check

- Search the knowledge source to see if the user's query matches an FAQ.
    - Share a concise summary of the FAQ response with the user—regardless of its content.
    - If the FAQ states that the issue is a known issue or is being worked on, communicate this to the user as part of your summary. Only treat the issue as a known issue if this is explicitly mentioned in the FAQ response.
    - Do **not** assume the issue is a known issue unless the FAQ explicitly says so.
- STRICTLY ONLY ask:
    “Did this solve your issue?”
      - If the user responds **yes**, resolve the issue and communicate that to the user.
      - If the user responds **no**, proceed to Step 2.
- Always complete Step 1 before moving to Step 2.

---

### ✅ Step 2: Known Issue Matching

- **Check if the issue matches a known issue based on FAQ or Step 1 Assistants response (if the its already a known issue and team is working on it)**.
    - **If yes:**
        - Inform the user it’s a known issue and is being worked on.
        - Ask if the user would like to talk to a our team about the issue.
            - **If the user says yes:**
                - Communicate to the user about that this known issue is now being escalated for further assistance.
                - STRICTLY Do not forget to mention that this is a known issue.
            - **If the user says no:**
                - Mark as “known issue”, resolve the issue, and communicate that since its a known issue it is now being marked as resolved.
    - **If no:**
        - Let the user know you need more details to report the bug.
        - Go to Step 3.

---

### ✅ Step 3: Gather New Issue Details
- **ONLY If the user's query is not a known issue** then follow below

Ask the user to provide the following information unless already available:
- **Issue Type**
  Options: Purchase Issue, Account Issue, Rewards Issue, Game Performance Issue, Gameplay Issue, Community Issue, Others

- **Detailed Description**
  Ask the user to describe what went wrong in their own words.

- **Timestamp**
  Ask when the issue occurred (date & time).

- **Frequency**
  Options: Always, Sometimes, Rarely, First Time

- **Game Version**
  Ask for the game version if available.

- **Network Type**
  Options: Wifi, Mobile Data

Use **contextual skipping**: If any of this data is already provided or available, do not re-ask.
You should convert timestamp provided by user in proper date format if the user has provided timestamp in adverbs of time(like today, tomorrow, yesterday etc.)
---

### ✅ Step 4: Confirm Summary

Summarize what has been collected and ask for confirmation:
> “Here’s what I’ve gathered:
>
> Issue Type: <user selected option>
> Issue Summary: <AI-generated summary>
> Time: <user provided timestamp (properly formatted)>
> Frequency: <user selected frequency>
> Game Version: <version>
> Network Type: <network type>
>
> Is this correct? (Yes/No)”

- If the user says **No**, ask for corrections.
- If the user says **Yes**, proceed to submit the issue.

---

### ✅ Step 5: Report Bug via External API

Once the user confirms the issue and its details call `update_cif` with below inputs:
{
      "cif": {
        "issue_type": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user selected option>
        },
        "issue_summary": {
          "type": "multiline",
          "value": "<AI-generated summary>"
        },
        "time": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user provided timestamp>"
        },
        "frequency": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<user selected frequency>"
        },
        "game_version": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<game version>"
        },
        "network_type": {
          "type": "singleline",
          "value": "<Network Type>"
        }
      },
      "issue_id": "<Issue ID>",
      "domain" : "<Domain of the issue>
    }

Call the `external_api_call` tool with the appropriate profile to report the bug with below inputs
{
  "issue_id": "<Issue ID>",
  "profile_id": "sbox-ai-agent-qa_profile_20250717081837494-ec8cf4fe6b36323",
  "domain": "<Domain>"
}
STRICTLY USE actual values of Issue ID and domain placeholders with exact values.

Once Bug reported successfully - Communicate to the user about the same and ALSO send the Issue ID to the user then ask if the user needs more queries and continue with the original flow.

---

<action>

## 🛠️ Bug Reporting Actions

---

### 1. Users query is a known issue **or if the AI Assistant’s reply indicates that the issue is already recognized, tracked, or being handled by the team in any way,** treat this as a known issue.


- `add_private_note` with summary of user problem
- `update_tag` with tags: ["bug-report", "known-issue"]
- `update_cif`:
  ```json
  {
    "issue_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Report Technical Issues or Bugs"
    },
    "issue_sub_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Known Issue"
    }
  }
  ```
- Based on user's choice:
    - If user wants escalation:
      - `escalate_issue` (communicated escalation to user)
    - If user does not want escalation:
      -`resolve_issue` (communicated resolution to user)
---

### 2. Bug Reported Successfully

When the Bug has been reported successfully by the assistant(Check the lastest assistant message) then call the below tools:
- `add_private_note` with note_text: Action Needed! Detailed Summary of user’s problem(including time, frequency, game version)
- `update_tag` with: ["bug-report", "jira-ticket-created","new-issue", "<type-specific-tag>"]
    Where <type-specific-tag> is one of:
        - purchase-issue
        - account-issue
        - rewards-issue
        - performance-issue
        - gameplay-issue
        - community-issue
        - other-issue
- `update_cif`:
  ```json
  {
    "issue_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "Report Technical Issues or Bugs"
    },
    "issue_sub_type": {
      "type": "singleline",
      "value": "New issue"
    }
  }
  ```
**These should be STRICTLY only called once after the Bug report has been successful and Issue has been shared with the user.**
---

### 3. Escalation Conditions

Trigger `escalate_issue` to queue if:
- User explicitly requests human help.
- Repeated confusion or inability to validate details.

---
**Final Reminders**
- Do NOT miss or mix any actions.
- Always take actions based on the scenario.
- Always invoke update_tag and all other required tools, even if you escalate or resolve the issue. These actions must never be skipped or delayed.

</action>

faqs_list.title: General troubleshooting
faqs_list.faq_body: If your game is freezing, crashing, not loading, or behaving irregularly we recommend that you try the following steps: Please close all of you running apps and restart your device. Make sure you have the latest update of the game installed. Launch the game. If your game is still not working properly after following the steps above please contact our Support team. Lastly, please try to include in your message the following answers: When did this issue first start - was it following an update? Does it happen when the game is loading or within the game itself? When did it happen? while spinning a slot? winning a specific item? Does it happen regularly? If possible, please send us a screenshot or a video of your issue. If you’re experiencing game crashes while playing the game, reinstalling the game might help. You can find out how to reinstall the game in this FAQ article . However, note that reinstalling the game should be a last resort.

faqs_list.title: My game got stuck on loading after the update?
faqs_list.faq_body: If the game isn't loading after an update: 1. Restart Your Device: A simple restart often clears up issues that prevent games from loading correctly. 2. Clear Cache/Data: Android: Go to your device's Settings > Apps, locate your game, and clear the cache and data. Clearing data might reset game progress if it's not backed up online. iOS : Settings > General > iPhone Storage, tap on the game, and choose Offload App. 3. Reinstall the App: If other steps don't work, uninstall and reinstall the game. Ensure your progress is backed up before doing this step.

faqs_list.title: How to handle harassment or blocking issues within the game?
faqs_list.faq_body: We prioritize creating an entertaining and secure environment for all our players. While we aim to foster a community where players from around the world can interact with each other positively, we're aware that, occasionally, individuals may not uphold these standards and engage in unacceptable behavior, including harassment. To ensure that your gaming experience remains enjoyable and free from the disruptions of unsavory behavior, we empower our players with tools to take immediate action against harassment. Using the Mute Feature: One of the quickest ways to address harassment is through the Mute feature—a simple yet effective solution to stop unwanted interactions. Should you encounter a player who is behaving offensively or making you uncomfortable, follow these steps to mute them: 1. Tap on the profile picture of the offending player. 2. Select "Mute" from the available options. 3. Confirm the action, and from that point on, you will no longer receive messages or any form of communication from that player Reaching Out to Support: While the Mute feature is a quick fix, we understand the importance of addressing the root cause of the problem. If you've encountered harassment, we encourage you to contact our support team for further action. Here's how you can contact support with details of the incident: 1. Contact our support team directly from within the game. 2. When reporting an incident, provide clear screenshots of the offensive messages for context. 3. Include details of the abusive player's profile—this information assists our support team in investigating and taking the necessary and appropriate actions against the harassing player. We thank you for choosing our games and hope you continue to have a fantastic time playing with us!

Thank you again for your continued support — it really helps keep our community strong. Wishing you a turn of great luck ahead! 🍀

faqs_list.title: How to handle harassment or blocking issues within the game?
faqs_list.faq_body: We prioritize creating an entertaining and secure environment for all our players. While we aim to foster a community where players from around the world can interact with each other positively, we're aware that, occasionally, individuals may not uphold these standards and engage in unacceptable behavior, including harassment. To ensure that your gaming experience remains enjoyable and free from the disruptions of unsavory behavior, we empower our players with tools to take immediate action against harassment. Using the Mute Feature: One of the quickest ways to address harassment is through the Mute feature—a simple yet effective solution to stop unwanted interactions. Should you encounter a player who is behaving offensively or making you uncomfortable, follow these steps to mute them: 1. Tap on the profile picture of the offending player. 2. Select "Mute" from the available options. 3. Confirm the action, and from that point on, you will no longer receive messages or any form of communication from that player Reaching Out to Support: While the Mute feature is a quick fix, we understand the importance of addressing the root cause of the problem. If you've encountered harassment, we encourage you to contact our support team for further action. Here's how you can contact support with details of the incident: 1. Contact our support team directly from within the game. 2. When reporting an incident, provide clear screenshots of the offensive messages for context. 3. Include details of the abusive player's profile—this information assists our support team in investigating and taking the necessary and appropriate actions against the harassing player. We thank you for choosing our games and hope you continue to have a fantastic time playing with us!

faqs_list.title: Did Huuuge block me from winning
faqs_list.faq_body: Hi [Player Name], Thank you for reaching out and for being part of our community for so many years — I can only imagine how upsetting it feels to think you’ve been treated unfairly, especially after showing such long-term loyalty and support. That kind of frustration is completely understandable. Please rest assured that no one, including any individual team member, has the ability to block your wins or influence your results. All spins, charm drops, and rewards are determined randomly by the game system, ensuring that every player has the same fair chance each time. I’m really sorry that your experience made you feel unheard. I’ll make sure your feedback about communication and how it was handled is shared with the right people. You’ve been with us for nearly a decade, and that dedication genuinely means a lot — whether you choose to take a break or return later, we’ll always appreciate the time you’ve spent with us. 💙

text.instruction:
MISSING REWARDS RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Begin by apologizing for the missing rewards experience and thank the player for reporting it.
2. Request clarification on the reward type if not already provided:
   - Ask whether the missing rewards are from "Battle Awards" or "Alliance Contributions".
   - Do not continue until the reward type is confirmed.
3. If the player confirms "Battle Awards":
   - Request any additional non-sensitive details relevant to the issue if not already provided, such as when the rewards were expected or whether similar rewards have been received before.
   - Reassure the player that you are reviewing the issue.
   - If validated details are available confirming the loss, proceed to Step 6.
   - If no relevant detail is available, offer basic checks such as restarting the game or confirming they are on the latest version.
   - If the issue persists:
     - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue` summarizing the current analysis.
     - Inform the player to not worry and that their progress is safe, and that you will escalate the issue for further review.
     - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
     - Do not speculate or attempt to verify reward status beyond available data.
4. If the player confirms "Alliance Contributions":
   - Review any available issue details to identify whether rewards were expected or may be pending based on game timing or contributions.
   - If no relevant information is available, advise restarting the game, as visual delays may occur.
   - If the issue persists after restart or confirmation:
     - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue` summarizing the current analysis.
     - Inform the player to not worry and that their progress is safe, and that you will escalate the issue for further review.
     - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
5. If both reward types are impacted or unclear:
   - Request clarification.
   - If both types are confirmed missing:
     - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue`.
     - Inform the player to not worry and that their progress is safe, and that you will escalate the issue for further review.
     - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
6. If the issue is resolved or rewards are confirmed received:
   - Thank the player and acknowledge completion.
   - Ask whether they require any further assistance before closing the issue.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (emails, names, account IDs, financial info, etc.).
- Never guarantee reward recovery unless supported by validated data.
- Never imply access to internal systems or financial records.
- Never provide technical or internal workflow details.
- Never speculate on causes or timelines.

user_message: How to trade charms
agent_response:
To trade charms, you need to access the Trade Arena. Here's a step-by-step guide:

1.  **Enter Charms Arena**: Tap the Charms Arena tile in your main lobby.
2.  **Find Trading Center**: Look for the Trading Center button next to the packs button at the bottom of your screen.
3.  **Explore Two Sections**: You'll see "My Requests" and "Other Requests".

**To Request a Charm**:
1.  Choose Your Set: In Charms Arena, select the set containing your missing charm.
2.  Find Missing Charms: Look for grayed-out charms (these are the ones you haven't collected yet).
3.  Hit "Ask for Charm": Tap the request button at the bottom of the missing charm.
4.  Your request goes live for other players to see.

**To Make a Trade (for "Other Requests")**:
1.  Browse Requests: Look through available requests to find ones you can fulfill.
2.  Click "Let's Trade": Hit the trade button when you find a perfect match.
3.  Confirm Details: Review the confirmation window.
4.  Accept the trade, and both players instantly receive their items.

Please note that charms with golden frames cannot be traded, and trade tokens are only used when trades successfully complete.

Does this help you understand how to trade charms?

faqs_list.title: 🎯 How to Trade Charms - Your Step-by-Step Guide!
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎯 How to Trade Charms - Your Step-by-Step Guide! Ready to dive into the exciting world of charm trading? Welcome to the Trade Arena - your hub for all trading activities! 🏘️ Accessing the Trade Arena: 🎯 Enter Charms Arena: Tap the Charms Arena tile in your main lobby 🔄 Find Trading Center: Look for the Trading Center button next to the packs button at the bottom of your screen 👀 Explore Two Sections: You'll see "My Requests" and "Other Requests" - both are important! 📝 My Requests - Your Personal Trading Hub! This is where all your charm requests live and breathe! 🕰️ Time-Limited Requests: ⏰ Expiration System: All requests have time limits - no worries if they expire! 🔄 Easy Re-requesting: You can always request the same charm again if you have enough tokens 📊 Track Your Activity: See all your active requests in one convenient place 🎯 How to Request a Charm: 1️⃣ Choose Your Set: In Charms Arena, select the set containing your missing charm 2️⃣ Find Missing Charms: Look for grayed-out charms (these are the ones you haven't collected yet) 3️⃣ Hit "Ask for Charm": Tap the request button at the bottom of the missing charm 4️⃣ Wait for Magic: Your request goes live for other players to see! ⚠️ Important Trading Rules: 🏆 Golden Frame Restriction: Charms with golden frames cannot be traded - these special treasures stay with you! 🪙 Token Consumption: Trade tokens are only used when trades actually complete successfully 📊 Rarity Matters: Different charm rarities require different amounts of trade tokens 📅 Daily Limits: You can request unlimited charms, but successful trades per day are limited 🌍 Other Requests - Help Fellow Collectors! This is where you become a trading hero by helping other collectors complete their sets! 📦 What You'll See: 🔍 Requested Charms: See exactly which charms other players desperately need 🎁 Trade Offers: Discover what you'll receive in exchange for helping out 🔄 Duplicate Only: You can only trade charms you have duplicates of - keep your collection intact! 🤝 Making the Trade: 👀 Browse Requests: Look through available requests to find ones you can fulfill 🎯 Click "Let's Trade": Hit the trade button when you find a perfect match ✅ Confirm Details: Review the confirmation window to make sure everything looks good ✨ Complete the Magic: Accept the trade and both players instantly receive their items!

faqs_list.title: 🤝 How Does Trading Work? (The Smart Collector's Secret!)
faqs_list.faq_body: Trading is where the magic happens! Connect with fellow collectors worldwide to complete your sets faster and help others do the same. 💡 How Trading Works: 🔍 Browse the Market: Check out what other players are offering 🪙 Trade Tokens: Your special trading currency (don't worry - we'll explain!) 💰 Smart Token Usage: Here's the best part - tokens are only used when trades actually complete, so you can browse and create offers freely! 🎯 Find Perfect Matches: Connect with players who have exactly what you need 🔄 Exchange Duplicates: Turn your extra items into missing pieces 📋 Your Trading Journey: 1️⃣ Choose Your Offer: Pick the charm you want to trade away 2️⃣ Set Your Request: Decide what you want in return 3️⃣ Post Your Trade: Make your offer available to other players 4️⃣ Wait for Magic: Another collector accepts your trade 5️⃣ Complete the Deal: Tokens are used only when the trade succeeds - no risk! 🎯 Pro Trading Tips: 💎 Save Your Tokens: Since tokens are only spent on completed trades, feel free to explore all options ⚖️ Fair Trading: Offer similar rarity levels for the best success rates 🔥 Hot Items: Rare charms get accepted quickly - everyone wants them! 🔄 Check Often: New opportunities appear all the time ⚠️ Trading Rules to Remember: 🏆 Golden Items: These special treasures stay with you forever - no trading allowed ⏰ Limited Items: Some special event items may have trading restrictions 🪙 Token Check: Make sure you have enough tokens for the trades you want ⭐ Rarity Matching: Some trades work best with similar rarity levels

faqs_list.title: 🤝 How Does Trading Work? (The Smart Collector's Secret!)
faqs_list.faq_body: Trading is where the magic happens! Connect with fellow collectors worldwide to complete your sets faster and help others do the same. 💡 How Trading Works: 🔍 Browse the Market: Check out what other players are offering 🪙 Trade Tokens: Your special trading currency (don't worry - we'll explain!) 💰 Smart Token Usage: Here's the best part - tokens are only used when trades actually complete, so you can browse and create offers freely! 🎯 Find Perfect Matches: Connect with players who have exactly what you need 🔄 Exchange Duplicates: Turn your extra items into missing pieces 📋 Your Trading Journey: 1️⃣ Choose Your Offer: Pick the charm you want to trade away 2️⃣ Set Your Request: Decide what you want in return 3️⃣ Post Your Trade: Make your offer available to other players 4️⃣ Wait for Magic: Another collector accepts your trade 5️⃣ Complete the Deal: Tokens are used only when the trade succeeds - no risk! 🎯 Pro Trading Tips: 💎 Save Your Tokens: Since tokens are only spent on completed trades, feel free to explore all options ⚖️ Fair Trading: Offer similar rarity levels for the best success rates 🔥 Hot Items: Rare charms get accepted quickly - everyone wants them! 🔄 Check Often: New opportunities appear all the time ⚠️ Trading Rules to Remember: 🏆 Golden Items: These special treasures stay with you forever - no trading allowed ⏰ Limited Items: Some special event items may have trading restrictions 🪙 Token Check: Make sure you have enough tokens for the trades you want ⭐ Rarity Matching: Some trades work best with similar rarity levels

agent_info.agent_input: How to trade charms
agent_info.agent_output:
To trade charms, you need to access the Trade Arena. Here's a step-by-step guide:

1.  **Enter Charms Arena**: Tap the Charms Arena tile in your main lobby.
2.  **Find Trading Center**: Look for the Trading Center button next to the packs button at the bottom of your screen.
3.  **Explore Two Sections**: You'll see "My Requests" and "Other Requests".

**To Request a Charm**:
1.  Choose Your Set: In Charms Arena, select the set containing your missing charm.
2.  Find Missing Charms: Look for grayed-out charms (these are the ones you haven't collected yet).
3.  Hit "Ask for Charm": Tap the request button at the bottom of the missing charm.
4.  Your request goes live for other players to see.

**To Make a Trade (for "Other Requests")**:
1.  Browse Requests: Look through available requests to find ones you can fulfill.
2.  Click "Let's Trade": Hit the trade button when you find a perfect match.
3.  Confirm Details: Review the confirmation window.
4.  Accept the trade, and both players instantly receive their items.

Please note that charms with golden frames cannot be traded, and trade tokens are only used when trades successfully complete.

Does this help you understand how to trade charms?

faqs_list.title: How to handle harassment or blocking issues within the game?
faqs_list.faq_body: We prioritize creating an entertaining and secure environment for all our players. While we aim to foster a community where players from around the world can interact with each other positively, we're aware that, occasionally, individuals may not uphold these standards and engage in unacceptable behavior, including harassment. To ensure that your gaming experience remains enjoyable and free from the disruptions of unsavory behavior, we empower our players with tools to take immediate action against harassment. Using the Mute Feature: One of the quickest ways to address harassment is through the Mute feature—a simple yet effective solution to stop unwanted interactions. Should you encounter a player who is behaving offensively or making you uncomfortable, follow these steps to mute them: 1. Tap on the profile picture of the offending player. 2. Select "Mute" from the available options. 3. Confirm the action, and from that point on, you will no longer receive messages or any form of communication from that player Reaching Out to Support: While the Mute feature is a quick fix, we understand the importance of addressing the root cause of the problem. If you've encountered harassment, we encourage you to contact our support team for further action. Here's how you can contact support with details of the incident: 1. Contact our support team directly from within the game. 2. When reporting an incident, provide clear screenshots of the offensive messages for context. 3. Include details of the abusive player's profile—this information assists our support team in investigating and taking the necessary and appropriate actions against the harassing player. We thank you for choosing our games and hope you continue to have a fantastic time playing with us!

faqs_list.title: How can I block someone who's harassing me?
faqs_list.faq_body: We treat cases of stalking, harassment or abusive behaviour seriously as we strive to create a friendly environment and community for our Players. The easiest way to deal with this kind of behaviour is to mute the player. To do this, please go to the player's profile and in the bottom left corner, there will be a 'Mute' button. In this way, the player will no longer be able to send messages to you. However, if after muting he/she will be still bothering you with inappropriate behaviour, please contact us with the screenshot of it and the offender’s profile and we will undertake further steps. And don't get caught up in the argument - the rules apply to everyone and someone can report you even if you were just defending yourself.

faqs_list.faq_body: We treat cases of stalking, harassment or abusive behaviour seriously as we strive to create a friendly environment and community for our Players. The easiest way to deal with this kind of behaviour is to mute the player. To do this, please go to the player's profile and in the bottom left corner, there will be a 'Mute' button. In this way, the player will no longer be able to send messages to you. However, if after muting he/she will be still bothering you with inappropriate behaviour, please contact us with the screenshot of it and the offender’s profile and we will undertake further steps. And don't get caught up in the argument - the rules apply to everyone and someone can report you even if you were just defending yourself.

faqs_list.title: How to handle harassment or blocking issues within the game?
faqs_list.faq_body: We prioritize creating an entertaining and secure environment for all our players. While we aim to foster a community where players from around the world can interact with each other positively, we're aware that, occasionally, individuals may not uphold these standards and engage in unacceptable behavior, including harassment. To ensure that your gaming experience remains enjoyable and free from the disruptions of unsavory behavior, we empower our players with tools to take immediate action against harassment. Using the Mute Feature: One of the quickest ways to address harassment is through the Mute feature—a simple yet effective solution to stop unwanted interactions. Should you encounter a player who is behaving offensively or making you uncomfortable, follow these steps to mute them: 1. Tap on the profile picture of the offending player. 2. Select "Mute" from the available options. 3. Confirm the action, and from that point on, you will no longer receive messages or any form of communication from that player Reaching Out to Support: While the Mute feature is a quick fix, we understand the importance of addressing the root cause of the problem. If you've encountered harassment, we encourage you to contact our support team for further action. Here's how you can contact support with details of the incident: 1. Contact our support team directly from within the game. 2. When reporting an incident, provide clear screenshots of the offensive messages for context. 3. Include details of the abusive player's profile—this information assists our support team in investigating and taking the necessary and appropriate actions against the harassing player. We thank you for choosing our games and hope you continue to have a fantastic time playing with us!

user_message: Yes, What are my rights under GDPR?
agent_response:
Your rights as a data subject under GDPR include:
  Reviewing your personal data: Upon your request, we will provide you with a copy of all your personal data stored in our systems in an easy-to-access electronic format.
  Erasing your personal data: You may request, under certain conditions, to have your personal data erased at any time. Please be advised that by erasing your personal data, all game progress will also be deleted and you will no longer be able to log in and play. This process cannot be undone, and deleted accounts cannot be recovered.
  Opting-in or opting-out of email communication: You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving additional communications, such as marketing emails or newsletters, from us by using the options provided in the game under Settings -> Edit -> Profile -> Edit.
  Other types of requests: You can also request to correct your personal data, transfer your personal data, object to certain processing activities, restrict data processing under certain circumstances, and opt-in or opt-out of personalized advertising.

You can submit any of these requests to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ).

Does this clarify your rights under GDPR?

user_message: How to Change Your Avatar & Frame
agent_response:
To change your avatar and frame, follow these steps:

1.  Navigate to your personal profile section.
2.  Tap 'Edit Profile' to access your customization options.
3.  Tap on your current avatar image.
4.  Browse and select the avatar you want.
5.  On the tab next to Avatars, you can pick a frame to complement your chosen avatar.

You also have the option to sync your account with Facebook to use your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar.

Is there anything else I can help with?

usecases_list.goal: This usecase is for handling issues to purchase or payment failures
This usecase is for handling issues to bugs or glitches in the gameplay

This usecase is for handling issues to the player account or profile

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the player for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review any available issue details to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the player not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue`, summarizing the current analysis.
   - Reassure the player that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that it requires deeper investigation.
   - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, confirm resolution with the player and thank them for their understanding. Then resolve using the `action_agent_tool`.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize player experience.

faqs_list.title: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame
faqs_list.faq_body: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame 🎆 Express Your Gaming Personality Ready to showcase your unique style? Customizing your avatar and frame is the perfect way to stand out and express your gaming personality! 🚀 Avatar Customization Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Access your customization options 🖼️ Click Your Picture: Tap on your current avatar image ✨ Choose Your Style: Browse and select the avatar that represents you 🖼️ Frame Selection Don't forget about frames! On the tab next to Avatars, you can pick the perfect frame to complement your chosen avatar and complete your unique look. 📸 Custom Facebook Avatar Option Want something truly personal? Here's an exciting option: 🔗 Sync with Facebook: Connect your account to Facebook 📸 Use Your Photo: Set your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar ✨ Personal Touch: Show your real personality in the game Create a look that's uniquely you and let your personality shine in every game! 🎆

faqs_list.title: ✏️ How to Change Your Account Name
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎆 Personalize Your Gaming Identity Ready to give your account a fresh new identity? Changing your name is incredibly simple and gives you the perfect opportunity to express your unique gaming personality! 🚀 Your Simple Name Change Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Look for the edit option to start customizing ✨ Start Editing: Begin crafting your perfect new gaming name 🎉 Save Your Changes: Confirm your awesome new identity 📊 Important Name Change Limit Keep in mind: You can change your name up to 3 times total , so choose wisely! Make each change count and pick a name that truly represents your gaming style. 💡 Pro Tip: Take your time choosing the perfect name - you want something you'll love for the long haul!

Changing your name is incredibly simple and gives you the perfect opportunity to express your unique gaming personality! 🚀 Your Simple Name Change Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Look for the edit option to start customizing ✨ Start Editing: Begin crafting your perfect new gaming name 🎉 Save Your Changes: Confirm your awesome new identity 📊 Important Name Change Limit Keep in mind: You can change your name up to 3 times total , so choose wisely! Make each change count and pick a name that truly represents your gaming style. 💡 Pro Tip: Take your time choosing the perfect name - you want something you'll love for the long haul!

agent_info.agent_input: How to Change Your Avatar & Frame

tool_output.result: Analysis processed successfully. Do not output anything to the player.

agent_info.agent_input: How to Change Your Avatar & Frame
agent_info.agent_output:
To change your avatar and frame, follow these steps:

1.  Navigate to your personal profile section.
2.  Tap 'Edit Profile' to access your customization options.
3.  Tap on your current avatar image.
4.  Browse and select the avatar you want.
5.  On the tab next to Avatars, you can pick a frame to complement your chosen avatar.

You also have the option to sync your account with Facebook to use your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar.

Is there anything else I can help with?

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the player for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review any available issue details to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the player not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue`, summarizing the current analysis.
   - Reassure the player that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that it requires deeper investigation.
   - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, confirm resolution with the player and thank them for their understanding. Then resolve using the `action_agent_tool`.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize player experience.

faqs_list.title: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame
faqs_list.faq_body: 🖼️ How to Change Your Avatar & Frame 🎆 Express Your Gaming Personality Ready to showcase your unique style? Customizing your avatar and frame is the perfect way to stand out and express your gaming personality! 🚀 Avatar Customization Process 📱 Enter Your Profile: Navigate to your personal profile section ✏️ Tap 'Edit Profile': Access your customization options 🖼️ Click Your Picture: Tap on your current avatar image ✨ Choose Your Style: Browse and select the avatar that represents you 🖼️ Frame Selection Don't forget about frames! On the tab next to Avatars, you can pick the perfect frame to complement your chosen avatar and complete your unique look. 📸 Custom Facebook Avatar Option Want something truly personal? Here's an exciting option: 🔗 Sync with Facebook: Connect your account to Facebook 📸 Use Your Photo: Set your Facebook profile picture as your in-game avatar ✨ Personal Touch: Show your real personality in the game Create a look that's uniquely you and let your personality shine in every game! 🎆

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the player for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review any available issue details to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the player not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue`, summarizing the current analysis.
   - Reassure the player that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that it requires deeper investigation.
   - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, confirm resolution with the player and thank them for their understanding. Then resolve using the `action_agent_tool`.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize player experience.

   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the player not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue`, summarizing the current analysis.
   - Reassure the player that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that it requires deeper investigation.
   - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, confirm resolution with the player and thank them for their understanding. Then resolve using the `action_agent_tool`.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize player experience.
