user_message: what is gdpr policy
agent_response:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a data protection and privacy regulation within the European Union and the European Economic Area (EEA). Its goal is to give individuals in the EU control over their personal data and to unify data privacy and protection laws.

Under GDPR, 'Personal Data' refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person. We collect data you provide to us (like contact and profile information, messages), data collected automatically (like account and in-game progress, IP address, device info, location, gameplay data), and data received from partners (like linked Facebook accounts, fraud data, platform data, advertising and analytics data).

This data is collected to make our games work, improve player experience, provide support, manage our relationship with you, enable communication with other players, show personalized advertisements, and keep our services safe and fair.

We protect your personal data by using appropriate technical, organizational, and logistic measures, notifying authorities of breaches if necessary, obtaining consent for data processing, keeping records, providing privacy training, auditing data policies, and employing a Data Protection Officer.

Your rights under GDPR include:
- Reviewing your personal data: We can provide a copy of your stored personal data.
- Erasing your personal data: You can request to have your personal data erased, but this will delete all game progress and cannot be undone.
- Opting-in or opting-out of email communication: You can manage this in the game settings.
- Other requests: Correcting your personal data, transferring your personal data, objecting to certain processing activities, restricting data processing, and opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising.

You can submit any of these requests to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our detailed Privacy Policy is available in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy.

Is there anything else I can help with regarding GDPR or your data privacy?

faqs_list.title: What is GDPR?
faqs_list.faq_body: DATA PRIVACY PROTECTION IS OUR HUUUGE RESPONSIBILITY [If you want to submit a request pursuant to GDPR, click Contact Us] What is GDPR? The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a data protection and privacy regulation within the European Union and the European Economic Area (EEA). The goal of GDPR is to give individuals in the European Union control over their personal data and to unify data privacy and protections laws within the European Countries. What is Personal Data under GDPR? In the context of GDPR, ‘Personal Data’ refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘data subject’). What Personal Data do we collect? The personal data Huuuge collects can be divided into three categories: 1. Data you provide to us ● Contact information (such as full name and email address) ● Profile information (such as age or gender or photograph) ● Your messages to the Service (such as chat logs and player support tickets) ● Other data you choose to give us 2. Data we collect automatically Data about your account and in-game progress Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device ID, advertising ID) Data about your device, such as device manufacturer, model, operating system and language General location data like country or city name Data about your use of the Service, such as gameplay data and your interactions with other players inside the games 3. Data we receive from our partners ● Data we receive if you link your Facebook account with our game ● Data to fight fraud (such as refund abuse in games or click fraud in advertising) ● Data from platforms that the games run on ● Data for advertising and analytics purposes, so we can provide you a better Service Why do we collect this data? This is probably the first question on your mind. First of all, we require this data to make our games work (from creating accounts to enabling you to connect to our games, including verifying your payments). Further, in an effort to continually make our games better, we are also using your data to develop and improve player experience, respond to your questions and provide support, manage our relationship with you, and enable you to communicate with other players. We may also use personal data to show you personalized advertisements tailored to your preferences. Last, but certainly not least, personal data is used to keep our services safe and fair by analyzing and monitoring the use of our games and social features. It enables us to take action against specific players involved in inappropriate behavior from in-game toxicity to cheating and fraud. In all of the above cases we may analyze, profile and segment all collected data as needed. What is Huuuge doing to protect your Personal Data? ● Using all appropriate technical, organizational and logistic measures to keep your data secure ● Notifying authorities of personal data breaches, if necessary ● Obtaining appropriate consent for data processing, if required ● Keeping records detailing data processing ● Providing privacy training for all our personnel ● Auditing and updating our data policies ● Employing a Data Protection Officer What are your rights under GDPR? Your rights as a data subject under GDPR include the following: Reviewing your personal data Upon your request, we will provide you with a copy of all your personal data stored in our systems in an easy-to access electronic format. Erasing your personal data You may request, under certain conditions, to have your personal data erased at any time. Please be advised that by erasing your personal data, all game progress will be also be deleted and you will no longer be able to log in and play. This process cannot be undone, deleted accounts cannot be recovered. Please do not remove our game before submitting a deletion request, as we may not be able to verify your identity in that case. Anonymized copies of some data (e.g. game logs) may remain in our database for some time. Please consult our Privacy Policy for more details (see below). Opting-in or opting-out of email communication You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving additional communications, such as marketing emails or newsletters, from us by using the options provided in the game under Settings -> Edit -> Profile -> Edit. Other types of requests Correcting your personal data Transferring your personal data Objecting to certain processing activities Restricting data processing under certain circumstances Opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising You can submit any of these request to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our Support team is also happy to answer any further questions you may have. You can find our detailed Privacy Policy in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy

Further, in an effort to continually make our games better, we are also using your data to develop and improve player experience, respond to your questions and provide support, manage our relationship with you, and enable you to communicate with other players. We may also use personal data to show you personalized advertisements tailored to your preferences. Your rights as a data subject under GDPR include the following: Reviewing your personal data Upon your request, we will provide you with a copy of all your personal data stored in our systems in an easy-to access electronic format. Erasing your personal data You may request, under certain conditions, to have your personal data erased at any time. Please be advised that by erasing your personal data, all game progress will be also be deleted and you will no longer be able to log in and play. This process cannot be undone, deleted accounts cannot be recovered. Please do not remove our game before submitting a deletion request, as we may not be able to verify your identity in that case. Anonymized copies of some data (e.g. game logs) may remain in our database for some time. Please consult our Privacy Policy for more details (see below). Opting-in or opting-out of email communication You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving additional communications, such as marketing emails or newsletters, from us by using the options provided in the game under Settings -> Edit -> Profile -> Edit. Other types of requests Correcting your personal data Transferring your personal data Objecting to certain processing activities Restricting data processing under certain circumstances Opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising You can submit any of these request to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our Support team is also happy to answer any further questions you may have. You can find our detailed Privacy Policy in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy

The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a data protection and privacy regulation within the European Union and the European Economic Area (EEA). Its goal is to give individuals in the EU control over their personal data and to unify data privacy and protection laws.

Under GDPR, 'Personal Data' refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person. We collect data you provide to us (like contact and profile information, messages), data collected automatically (like account and in-game progress, IP address, device info, location, gameplay data), and data received from partners (like linked Facebook accounts, fraud data, platform data, advertising and analytics data).

This data is collected to make our games work, improve player experience, provide support, manage our relationship with you, enable communication with other players, show personalized advertisements, and keep our services safe and fair.

We protect your personal data by using appropriate technical, organizational, and logistic measures, notifying authorities of breaches if necessary, obtaining consent for data processing, keeping records, providing privacy training, auditing data policies, and employing a Data Protection Officer.

Your rights under GDPR include:
- Reviewing your personal data: We can provide a copy of your stored personal data.
- Erasing your personal data: You can request to have your personal data erased, but this will delete all game progress and cannot be undone.
- Opting-in or opting-out of email communication: You can manage this in the game settings.
- Other requests: Correcting your personal data, transferring your personal data, objecting to certain processing activities, restricting data processing, and opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising.

You can submit any of these requests to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our detailed Privacy Policy is available in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy.

Is there anything else I can help with regarding GDPR or your data privacy?

faqs_list.title: What is GDPR?
faqs_list.faq_body: DATA PRIVACY PROTECTION IS OUR HUUUGE RESPONSIBILITY [If you want to submit a request pursuant to GDPR, click Contact Us] What is GDPR? The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a data protection and privacy regulation within the European Union and the European Economic Area (EEA). The goal of GDPR is to give individuals in the European Union control over their personal data and to unify data privacy and protections laws within the European Countries. What is Personal Data under GDPR? In the context of GDPR, ‘Personal Data’ refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person (‘data subject’). What Personal Data do we collect? The personal data Huuuge collects can be divided into three categories: 1. Data you provide to us ● Contact information (such as full name and email address) ● Profile information (such as age or gender or photograph) ● Your messages to the Service (such as chat logs and player support tickets) ● Other data you choose to give us 2. Data we collect automatically Data about your account and in-game progress Your IP address and mobile device identifiers (such as your device ID, advertising ID) Data about your device, such as device manufacturer, model, operating system and language General location data like country or city name Data about your use of the Service, such as gameplay data and your interactions with other players inside the games 3. Data we receive from our partners ● Data we receive if you link your Facebook account with our game ● Data to fight fraud (such as refund abuse in games or click fraud in advertising) ● Data from platforms that the games run on ● Data for advertising and analytics purposes, so we can provide you a better Service Why do we collect this data? This is probably the first question on your mind. First of all, we require this data to make our games work (from creating accounts to enabling you to connect to our games, including verifying your payments). Further, in an effort to continually make our games better, we are also using your data to develop and improve player experience, respond to your questions and provide support, manage our relationship with you, and enable you to communicate with other players. We may also use personal data to show you personalized advertisements tailored to your preferences. Last, but certainly not least, personal data is used to keep our services safe and fair by analyzing and monitoring the use of our games and social features. It enables us to take action against specific players involved in inappropriate behavior from in-game toxicity to cheating and fraud. In all of the above cases we may analyze, profile and segment all collected data as needed. What is Huuuge doing to protect your Personal Data? ● Using all appropriate technical, organizational and logistic measures to keep your data secure ● Notifying authorities of personal data breaches, if necessary ● Obtaining appropriate consent for data processing, if required ● Keeping records detailing data processing ● Providing privacy training for all our personnel ● Auditing and updating our data policies ● Employing a Data Protection Officer What are your rights under GDPR? Your rights as a data subject under GDPR include the following: Reviewing your personal data Upon your request, we will provide you with a copy of all your personal data stored in our systems in an easy-to access electronic format. Erasing your personal data You may request, under certain conditions, to have your personal data erased at any time. Please be advised that by erasing your personal data, all game progress will be also be deleted and you will no longer be able to log in and play. This process cannot be undone, deleted accounts cannot be recovered. Please do not remove our game before submitting a deletion request, as we may not be able to verify your identity in that case. Anonymized copies of some data (e.g. game logs) may remain in our database for some time. Please consult our Privacy Policy for more details (see below). Opting-in or opting-out of email communication You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving additional communications, such as marketing emails or newsletters, from us by using the options provided in the game under Settings -> Edit -> Profile -> Edit. Other types of requests Correcting your personal data Transferring your personal data Objecting to certain processing activities Restricting data processing under certain circumstances Opting-in or opting-out of personalized advertising You can submit any of these request to our Support team through the in-game Help option, found in Settings (FAQ). Our Support team is also happy to answer any further questions you may have. You can find our detailed Privacy Policy in our in-game FAQ or at http://www.huuugegames.com/privacy-policy

user_message: How to add or remove friends
agent_response:
To add a friend, go to the other player’s profile and tap the ‘Connect’ button. They will need to accept your request. To remove a friend, go to their profile and click on the ‘Remove friend’ button.

Is there anything else I can help with?

faqs_list.title: How do I add / remove friends?
faqs_list.faq_body: First, enter the other player’s profile: If you want to invite the player to be your friend, tap the ‘Connect’ button. Keep in mind that the request has to be accepted to make a connection If you are already friends and you want the player to be removed, click on ‘Remove friend’ button

faqs_list.title: How do you invite friends to the table and manage friend lists?
faqs_list.faq_body: Our game makes it easy and social to enjoy your favorite casino games with friends. To extend an invitation: As you enter the game, watch for available seats at the table. Tap the free seat and select the person to join you at the table. After you send the invite, your friend will receive a notification. If they accept your invitation, they will occupy the previously free seat, and you can start playing together immediately! For those who prefer a more exclusive gaming experience, **starting a private table** is a fantastic option. Doing so allows you to reserve all the seats and ensure that only your friends can join the game. To Manage your friends, access the Social section from the main Lobby. Within the Social section, you'll find your entire friend list. Browse through it to see who is online, or take note of friends you haven't seen in a while. Suppose you need to tidy up your friend list. In that case, you can easily remove friends by selecting the individual you wish to remove and confirming your choice. This lets you keep your list up-to-date and filled with active friends you regularly play with. Remember, it's more than just a game; it's a community. Inviting friends and managing your friend list enhances your enjoyment by sharing the thrills with others. Whether you're spinning slots or placing bets at the blackjack table, everything is more fun with friends!

This usecase is for handling issues to bugs or glitches in the gameplay
This usecase is for handling issues related to game rewards

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
GAMEPLAY BUGS OR GLITCHES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Begin by apologizing for the bug or glitch experience and thank the player for reporting it.
2. If missing, request ONLY non-sensitive gameplay details needed to analyze the issue, such as:
   - what they experienced
   - when the issue occurred
   - whether it appears device- or platform-specific
   - whether it happens consistently or intermittently
   (Never request or confirm sensitive information.)
3. Review any available issue details to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known behavior related to the bug or glitch.
   Do not speculate or infer missing data.
4. If no relevant detail is available, offer basic troubleshooting steps, such as:
   - restarting the game
   - checking for available game or system updates
   - confirming they are running the latest version
   (Do not reference internal systems or knowledge sources.)
5. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the player confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue`, summarizing the current analysis including:
     -- reported issue details
     -- symptoms observed
     -- device/platform
     -- troubleshooting attempted
   - Inform the player that the glitch will be resolved soon and reassure the player that their report is valuable, that the issue will be investigated, and thank them for their patience and support.
   - Follow escalation guidelines to escalate using the `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (emails, names, IDs, phone numbers, financial info, etc.).
- Never imply certainty about cause or fix unless supported by validated data.
- Never promise a specific resolution timeline or guarantee.
- Never minimize player experience or dismiss bug claims.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PURCHASE OR PAYMENT ISSUE RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Begin by thanking the player for supporting the game and apologize for the inconvenience.
2. If purchase details are missing, request ONLY non-sensitive information, such as:
   - approximate purchase date
   - item name
   - platform or storefront
   - approximate purchase amount
   (Never request or confirm sensitive information or payment credentials.)
3. Review any available issue details to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or errors regarding the purchase.
   Do not speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant detail is available, advise the player to review their bank or app-store transaction history to confirm whether the payment succeeded or failed.
   Do not reference internal systems, knowledge sources, or troubleshooting origins.
5. If the transaction succeeded on the player’s side:
   - Reassure the player that their payment is secure and being verified.
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue` summarizing the current analysis.
   - Follow the escalation guidelines to escalate using `outside_ai_agent_capability` fallback.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
6. If the transaction failed on the player’s side:
   - Log findings using `add_private_note_to_issue` summarizing the failure condition.
   - Respectfully inform the player that no completed purchase is recorded. Ask them to check with their payment provider if needed.
   - After informing the player, reject the issue using `action_agent_tool`.
7. In all cases, provide reassurance that the issue will be handled appropriately, thank the player for their patience, and maintain a calm, empathetic tone.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (bank details, card numbers, emails, IDs, full names, etc.).
- Never claim access to financial systems or banking records.
- Never confirm root cause unless explicitly supported by validated data.
- Never generalize or guess about loss, refunds, charge status, or timing.
- Never imply certainty about refund or transaction status without confirmation.

faqs_list.title: ⭐ How to Earn League Points
faqs_list.faq_body: Earning League Points is simple and rewarding! 💰 You'll receive 1 League Point for every 100,000 chips you win on Slots. Example: Win 50,000,000 chips = Earn 500 League Points! 🎊 🎁 What is the Jackpot Share Reward? Get ready for something truly special! 🌟 The Jackpot Share Reward is our unique feature where a portion of every jackpot prize gets distributed among all club members. It's like having a safety net of wins—when someone in your club hits it big, everyone celebrates together! 👥 Is the Jackpot Share for All Club Players? Absolutely! Every single club member gets to share in the jackpot excitement! 🎉 Your personal share depends on your club league level, your Huuuge Rewards card benefits, and your game progress. When your clubmates hit a jackpot, you'll see your share appear on the Club Wall—it's like getting surprise bonuses just for being part of the family! 📈 Does My Game Progress Affect Jackpot Sharing? Yes! Your journey through the game is one of the key factors in calculating your Jackpot Share reward. 🏆 We've designed this system to recognize every player's unique contribution to the club and their dedication to the game. The more you progress, the more you're rewarded!

faqs_list.title: ❓ What is Jackpot Draw?
faqs_list.faq_body: 🌟 Your Exciting Weekly Contest Jackpot Draw is an incredible new contest that brings heart-pounding excitement to your gaming routine! This amazing weekly event gives you the chance to win fantastic prizes that will supercharge your gameplay experience. It's not just another game feature - it's your personal ticket to potentially life-changing rewards! 🎫 How the Magic Works Here's how you can join this thrilling weekly adventure: 🎁 Gather Tickets: Collect Jackpot Draw tickets from multiple exciting sources 📅 Daily Opportunities: Earn tickets through daily log-in bonuses 🎮 In-Game Activities: Participate in club events, lottery games, and missions 🛍️ Purchase Rewards: Get bonus tickets with your purchases ✨ Automatic Entry: With enough tickets, you're automatically entered into the weekly draw 🚀 Weekly Excitement The Jackpot Draw takes place once every week , creating that perfect rhythm of anticipation and excitement! Every week brings a fresh chance to win amazing prizes. Keep your eyes peeled for the thrilling pop-up announcing the winner - it could be YOU! 🌟

faqs_list.title: 🎰 Understanding Jackpots
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎆 Your Guide to Jackpot Success Wondering why you didn't hit that jackpot? Understanding how jackpots work is key to maximizing your winning potential! 🎯 Essential Jackpot Rules For symbols to pay out the jackpot, they must meet specific requirements: 📋 Payline Placement: All jackpot symbols must be on an active payline ➡️ Left to Right: Symbols must count from left to right across the reels 🎯 Perfect Alignment: Every symbol must be in the correct position ✅ Complete Sequence: No gaps or missing symbols allowed 📚 Where to Find Jackpot Information Get all the details you need for jackpot success: 🎰 Enter Any Slot: Go to your favorite slot machine ⚙️ Menu Access: Click the menu symbol in the upper right corner 📊 Second Section: Navigate to the second section 🏆 'Wins & Paylines': Find complete jackpot information here 🗺️ Payline View: Check the third section to see payline configurations Understanding these rules puts you in the best position to hit those incredible jackpots!

Is there anything else I can help with?

Get ready for something truly special! 🌟 The Jackpot Share Reward is our unique feature where a portion of every jackpot prize gets distributed among all club members. It's like having a safety net of wins—when someone in your club hits it big, everyone celebrates together! 👥 Is the Jackpot Share for All Club Players? Absolutely! Every single club member gets to share in the jackpot excitement! 🎉 Your personal share depends on your club league level, your Huuuge Rewards card benefits, and your game progress. When your clubmates hit a jackpot, you'll see your share appear on the Club Wall—it's like getting surprise bonuses just for being part of the family! 📈 Does My Game Progress Affect Jackpot Sharing? Yes! Your journey through the game is one of the key factors in calculating your Jackpot Share reward. 🏆 We've designed this system to recognize every player's unique contribution to the club and their dedication to the game. The more you progress, the more you're rewarded!

faqs_list.title: ❓ What is Jackpot Draw?
faqs_list.faq_body: 🌟 Your Exciting Weekly Contest Jackpot Draw is an incredible new contest that brings heart-pounding excitement to your gaming routine! This amazing weekly event gives you the chance to win fantastic prizes that will supercharge your gameplay experience. It's not just another game feature - it's your personal ticket to potentially life-changing rewards! 🎫 How the Magic Works Here's how you can join this thrilling weekly adventure: 🎁 Gather Tickets: Collect Jackpot Draw tickets from multiple exciting sources 📅 Daily Opportunities: Earn tickets through daily log-in bonuses 🎮 In-Game Activities: Participate in club events, lottery games, and missions 🛍️ Purchase Rewards: Get bonus tickets with your purchases ✨ Automatic Entry: With enough tickets, you're automatically entered into the weekly draw 🚀 Weekly Excitement The Jackpot Draw takes place once every week , creating that perfect rhythm of anticipation and excitement! Every week brings a fresh chance to win amazing prizes. Keep your eyes peeled for the thrilling pop-up announcing the winner - it could be YOU! 🌟

faqs_list.title: 🎰 Understanding Jackpots
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎆 Your Guide to Jackpot Success Wondering why you didn't hit that jackpot? Understanding how jackpots work is key to maximizing your winning potential! 🎯 Essential Jackpot Rules For symbols to pay out the jackpot, they must meet specific requirements: 📋 Payline Placement: All jackpot symbols must be on an active payline ➡️ Left to Right: Symbols must count from left to right across the reels 🎯 Perfect Alignment: Every symbol must be in the correct position ✅ Complete Sequence: No gaps or missing symbols allowed 📚 Where to Find Jackpot Information Get all the details you need for jackpot success: 🎰 Enter Any Slot: Go to your favorite slot machine ⚙️ Menu Access: Click the menu symbol in the upper right corner 📊 Second Section: Navigate to the second section 🏆 'Wins & Paylines': Find complete jackpot information here 🗺️ Payline View: Check the third section to see payline configurations Understanding these rules puts you in the best position to hit those incredible jackpots!

faqs_list.title: 🎰 Can I Play While Spinning?
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎆 Seamless Gaming Experience Absolutely! We've designed these mini-games to integrate perfectly with your regular slot gameplay for maximum convenience and fun. 🚀 How the Magic Works ⏸️ Smart Pause: When you switch to Candy Chase/Sky Hunt, your current slot game pauses automatically 🎯 Play Your Adventure: Enjoy your mini-game adventure without losing your slot progress 🔄 Seamless Return: When you come back, your slot game resumes exactly where you left off ✨ No Interruption: Your gaming flow remains smooth and uninterrupted It's the best of both worlds - enjoy your mini-game adventures while keeping your slot momentum going! 🌟

faqs_list.title: What’s a Magical Pack?
faqs_list.faq_body: 🔮 Magical Pack Deep Dive Want to master the art of Magical Packs? Here's everything you need to know! ✨ Magical Pack Strategy: 🎯 One Extra Shot: Get another chance at the charms you really need 🔄 Reshuffle Power: Hit "Re-open" to reshuffle all charms for different results 🤔 Choose Wisely: You'll get completely different charms, so think strategically 🍀 Good Luck Factor: Sometimes the reshuffle brings exactly what you need!

faqs_list.title: Introducing Huuuge Adventure!
faqs_list.faq_body: Huuuge Adventure turns classic slot gameplay into an epic journey filled with challenges and amazing rewards. Each phase offers evolving backgrounds, optional difficulty levels, and unique objectives to fulfill. It's not just about spinning - Huuuge Adventure is about progressing, achieving, and celebrating milestones in a more engaging way than ever before! What are the Available Slot Machines Huuuge Adventure features a wide variety of slot machines from the Huuuge Casino portfolio. Available machines include popular titles such as: Featured Slot Machines: God of Sky (Zeus) - Ancient mythology themed slot Huuuge Quick Jackpots - Fast-paced jackpot action Spinner Spinner Chicken Winner - Fun farm-themed gameplay Dorothy's Adventure - Wizard of Oz inspired slot Buffalo Rush - Wild west adventure Baker Street Mystery (Sherlock) - Detective mystery theme Phoenix Garden - Mystical garden setting Crystal Cave - Gem and crystal themed There are many more, including classic slots like Classic Hot , themed adventures like Aztec 2 , and newer additions like Luxor Treasures and Gods of the Desert . Each slot machine offers mission types and challenges based on its unique features. How do I enter Huuuge Adventure? You must reach Level 30 to unlock Huuuge Adventure. Where to find it: Main Lobby: Look for the dedicated Huuuge Adventure icon in the main lobby, which displays the remaining event duration Slot Machine Slider: Access via the slider bar Before Level 30: The Huuuge Adventure icon will appear locked with a star and a level requirement. Tap it to see "Huuuge Adventure - Reach ⭐ 30 lvl to unlock." After Level 30: The icon unlocks with a glowing effect and tooltip, and becomes accessible through all entry points. Experience the Adventure as you want it Huuuge Adventure offers three difficulty levels to match your playing style and risk preference: Easy: Lower minimum bet requirements, simpler challenges Medium: Moderate difficulty with balanced bet requirements Hard: Higher minimum bets, more challenging objectives, bigger rewards The default difficulty is set to medium. Keep in mind: Your difficulty choice is final and cannot be changed once selected for a phase. Choose carefully based on your preferred betting level and desired challenge intensity. How long does HUUUGE Adventure last? Huuuge Adventure operates on an event-based system : Event Duration: Each Huuuge Adventure event is time-limited and can last between 3 to 7 days. Phase Progression: Individual phases have no time limit—progress at your own pace. The only limit is the duration of the event itself. Event Reset: When an event ends, progress resets, and players start from Phase 1 in the next event Adventure Scale: Each event features 10 exciting phases, providing hours of engaging progression and rewards for dedicated players.

faqs_list.title: 🎰 Can I Play While Spinning?
faqs_list.faq_body: 🎆 Seamless Gaming Experience Absolutely! We've designed these mini-games to integrate perfectly with your regular slot gameplay for maximum convenience and fun. 🚀 How the Magic Works ⏸️ Smart Pause: When you switch to Candy Chase/Sky Hunt, your current slot game pauses automatically 🎯 Play Your Adventure: Enjoy your mini-game adventure without losing your slot progress 🔄 Seamless Return: When you come back, your slot game resumes exactly where you left off ✨ No Interruption: Your gaming flow remains smooth and uninterrupted It's the best of both worlds - enjoy your mini-game adventures while keeping your slot momentum going! 🌟

faqs_list.title: What’s a Magical Pack?
faqs_list.faq_body: 🔮 Magical Pack Deep Dive Want to master the art of Magical Packs? Here's everything you need to know! ✨ Magical Pack Strategy: 🎯 One Extra Shot: Get another chance at the charms you really need 🔄 Reshuffle Power: Hit "Re-open" to reshuffle all charms for different results 🤔 Choose Wisely: You'll get completely different charms, so think strategically 🍀 Good Luck Factor: Sometimes the reshuffle brings exactly what you need!

faqs_list.title: Introducing Huuuge Adventure!
faqs_list.faq_body: Huuuge Adventure turns classic slot gameplay into an epic journey filled with challenges and amazing rewards. Each phase offers evolving backgrounds, optional difficulty levels, and unique objectives to fulfill. It's not just about spinning - Huuuge Adventure is about progressing, achieving, and celebrating milestones in a more engaging way than ever before! What are the Available Slot Machines Huuuge Adventure features a wide variety of slot machines from the Huuuge Casino portfolio. Available machines include popular titles such as: Featured Slot Machines: God of Sky (Zeus) - Ancient mythology themed slot Huuuge Quick Jackpots - Fast-paced jackpot action Spinner Spinner Chicken Winner - Fun farm-themed gameplay Dorothy's Adventure - Wizard of Oz inspired slot Buffalo Rush - Wild west adventure Baker Street Mystery (Sherlock) - Detective mystery theme Phoenix Garden - Mystical garden setting Crystal Cave - Gem and crystal themed There are many more, including classic slots like Classic Hot , themed adventures like Aztec 2 , and newer additions like Luxor Treasures and Gods of the Desert . Each slot machine offers mission types and challenges based on its unique features. How do I enter Huuuge Adventure? You must reach Level 30 to unlock Huuuge Adventure. Where to find it: Main Lobby: Look for the dedicated Huuuge Adventure icon in the main lobby, which displays the remaining event duration Slot Machine Slider: Access via the slider bar Before Level 30: The Huuuge Adventure icon will appear locked with a star and a level requirement. Tap it to see "Huuuge Adventure - Reach ⭐ 30 lvl to unlock." After Level 30: The icon unlocks with a glowing effect and tooltip, and becomes accessible through all entry points. Experience the Adventure as you want it Huuuge Adventure offers three difficulty levels to match your playing style and risk preference: Easy: Lower minimum bet requirements, simpler challenges Medium: Moderate difficulty with balanced bet requirements Hard: Higher minimum bets, more challenging objectives, bigger rewards The default difficulty is set to medium. Keep in mind: Your difficulty choice is final and cannot be changed once selected for a phase. Choose carefully based on your preferred betting level and desired challenge intensity. How long does HUUUGE Adventure last? Huuuge Adventure operates on an event-based system : Event Duration: Each Huuuge Adventure event is time-limited and can last between 3 to 7 days. Phase Progression: Individual phases have no time limit—progress at your own pace. The only limit is the duration of the event itself. Event Reset: When an event ends, progress resets, and players start from Phase 1 in the next event Adventure Scale: Each event features 10 exciting phases, providing hours of engaging progression and rewards for dedicated players.

user_message: facing login issue
agent_response:
I apologize for the inconvenience you're facing with your login, <PERSON_1>, and thank you for bringing this to my attention.

Since you're experiencing a login issue on your Desktop with Mac OS 10.15.7 using Chrome, please try these basic troubleshooting steps:

1.  Restart your device.
2.  Clear your browser's cache and cookies.
3.  Check for any available updates for your Chrome browser.
4.  Verify that your internet connection is stable.

Have you already tried any of these steps, or does this help resolve the issue?

usecases_list.goal: This usecase is for handling issues to purchase or payment failures
This usecase is for handling issues to bugs or glitches in the gameplay
This usecase is for handling issues related to game rewards
This usecase is for handling issues to the player account or profile

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **message_to_user** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **message_to_user** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

user_message: Someone Beat Me to the Trade!
agent_response:
I understand it can be frustrating when someone beats you to a trade, <PERSON_1>. This happens because all trade requests are visible to players worldwide, and the fastest trader wins. Everyone has an equal chance to participate.

My best advice is to keep trying, be quick, and stay positive. New opportunities appear constantly, and your perfect trade is just around the corner.

Is there anything else I can help with?

faqs_list.title: 🏃‍♂️ Someone Beat Me to the Trade!
faqs_list.faq_body: Don't worry - this happens to the best of us in the fast-paced trading world! 🌍 Why This Happens: 👥 Global Visibility: All requests are visible to players worldwide for maximum trading speed ⚡ First Come, First Served: The fastest trader wins - it keeps the market exciting! 🎯 Fair Opportunity: Everyone gets an equal chance to participate in trades 💪 What to Do Next: 🔄 Try Again: Don't give up - new opportunities appear constantly ⏰ Be Quick: The early bird catches the charm - speed matters in trading! 🍀 Stay Positive: Your perfect trade is just around the corner

faqs_list.title: 🪙 How to Get Trade Tokens - Your Trading Currency!
faqs_list.faq_body: Ready to become a trading master? First, you'll need Trade Tokens - the special currency that makes all the magic happen! 🎁 Ways to Earn Trade Tokens: 🤝 Make Trades: Some successful trades reward you with bonus tokens - trading pays off! 🏆 Milestone Rewards: Hit those collection milestones and you might find tokens waiting for you 📈 Level Up Rewards: Keep climbing those levels - tokens can appear as level-up bonuses 🎉 Special Events: Join limited-time events for exclusive token opportunities 📰 News Feed Offers: Check your news feed for special token deals you won't want to miss 🛒 Shop Packages: Look for marked packages in the shop that include trade tokens 💡 Pro Tip: Keep playing regularly and tokens will come naturally - patience pays off in the trading world!

First, you'll need Trade Tokens - the special currency that makes all the magic happen! 🎁 Ways to Earn Trade Tokens: 🤝 Make Trades: Some successful trades reward you with bonus tokens - trading pays off! 🏆 Milestone Rewards: Hit those collection milestones and you might find tokens waiting for you 📈 Level Up Rewards: Keep climbing those levels - tokens can appear as level-up bonuses 🎉 Special Events: Join limited-time events for exclusive token opportunities 📰 News Feed Offers: Check your news feed for special token deals you won't want to miss 🛒 Shop Packages: Look for marked packages in the shop that include trade tokens 💡 Pro Tip: Keep playing regularly and tokens will come naturally - patience pays off in the trading world!

agent_info.agent_output:
I understand it can be frustrating when someone beats you to a trade, <PERSON_1>. This happens because all trade requests are visible to players worldwide, and the fastest trader wins. Everyone has an equal chance to participate.

My best advice is to keep trying, be quick, and stay positive. New opportunities appear constantly, and your perfect trade is just around the corner.

Is there anything else I can help with?

faqs_list.title: 🏃‍♂️ Someone Beat Me to the Trade!
faqs_list.faq_body: Don't worry - this happens to the best of us in the fast-paced trading world! 🌍 Why This Happens: 👥 Global Visibility: All requests are visible to players worldwide for maximum trading speed ⚡ First Come, First Served: The fastest trader wins - it keeps the market exciting! 🎯 Fair Opportunity: Everyone gets an equal chance to participate in trades 💪 What to Do Next: 🔄 Try Again: Don't give up - new opportunities appear constantly ⏰ Be Quick: The early bird catches the charm - speed matters in trading! 🍀 Stay Positive: Your perfect trade is just around the corner

user_message: I am facing issue with my app login
agent_response:
I apologize for the inconvenience you're experiencing with your app login, <PERSON_1>, and thank you for bringing it to my attention.

To help me understand the issue better, could you please tell me approximately when you first noticed this login problem?

In the meantime, since you are using a Desktop with Mac OS 10.15.7 and Chrome, please try these basic troubleshooting steps:
1. Restart the app and your device.
2. Check for any available updates for the app.
3. Verify your internet connection is stable.

Does this help with your login issue?

usecases_list.goal: This usecase is for handling issues to purchase or payment failures
This usecase is for handling issues to bugs or glitches in the gameplay
This usecase is for handling issues related to game rewards
This usecase is for handling issues to the player account or profile

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PURCHASE OR PAYMENT ISSUE RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps in order for purchase or payment issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by thanking the user for supporting the game and apologize for the inconvenience.
2. If purchase details are missing, request ONLY non-sensitive information, such as:
   - approximate purchase date
   - item name
   - platform or storefront
   - approximate purchase amount
   **Note: Never request or confirm sensitive information or payment credentials.**
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** along with the purchase details can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or errors regarding the purchase.
   DO NOT speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant information is available, perform FAQ search by calling the `get_faqs` tool to see if FAQ results can be used to provide a resolution.
5. If even FAQ results cannot provide any resolution, advise the user to review their bank or app-store transaction history to confirm whether the payment succeeded or failed.
   Do not reference internal systems, knowledge sources, FAQ results or troubleshooting origins.
6. If the transaction/payment was succeeded on the user’s side:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their payment is secure and currently being verified.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If the transaction failed on the user’s side:
   - Reject the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the failure condition.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to construct a user response as respectfully informing the user that no completed purchase is recorded and asking them to check with their payment provider if needed.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (bank details, card numbers, emails, IDs, full names, etc.).
- Never claim access to financial systems or banking records.
- Never confirm root cause unless explicitly supported by validated data.
- Never generalize or guess about loss, refunds, charge status, or timing.
- Never imply certainty about refund or transaction status without confirmation.

      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their payment is secure and currently being verified.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If the transaction failed on the user’s side:
   - Reject the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the failure condition.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to construct a user response as respectfully informing the user that no completed purchase is recorded and asking them to check with their payment provider if needed.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (bank details, card numbers, emails, IDs, full names, etc.).
- Never claim access to financial systems or banking records.
- Never confirm root cause unless explicitly supported by validated data.
- Never generalize or guess about loss, refunds, charge status, or timing.
- Never imply certainty about refund or transaction status without confirmation.

structuredContent.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PURCHASE OR PAYMENT ISSUE RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps in order for purchase or payment issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by thanking the user for supporting the game and apologize for the inconvenience.
2. If purchase details are missing, request ONLY non-sensitive information, such as:
   - approximate purchase date
   - item name
   - platform or storefront
   - approximate purchase amount
   **Note: Never request or confirm sensitive information or payment credentials.**
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** along with the purchase details can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or errors regarding the purchase.
   DO NOT speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant information is available, perform FAQ search by calling the `get_faqs` tool to see if FAQ results can be used to provide a resolution.
5. If even FAQ results cannot provide any resolution, advise the user to review their bank or app-store transaction history to confirm whether the payment succeeded or failed.
   Do not reference internal systems, knowledge sources, FAQ results or troubleshooting origins.
6. If the transaction/payment was succeeded on the user’s side:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their payment is secure and currently being verified.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If the transaction failed on the user’s side:
   - Reject the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the failure condition.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to construct a user response as respectfully informing the user that no completed purchase is recorded and asking them to check with their payment provider if needed.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (bank details, card numbers, emails, IDs, full names, etc.).
- Never claim access to financial systems or banking records.
- Never confirm root cause unless explicitly supported by validated data.
- Never generalize or guess about loss, refunds, charge status, or timing.
- Never imply certainty about refund or transaction status without confirmation.

user_message: help
agent_response:
Hello <PERSON_1>,

I can help you with general troubleshooting steps if your game is freezing, crashing, not loading, or behaving irregularly. Please try the following:

1. Close all running apps and restart your device (Desktop, Mac OS 10.15.7).
2. Make sure you have the latest update of the game (v5.2.1) installed.
3. Launch the game.

If the issue persists, please provide more details:
- When did this issue first start? Was it after an update?
- Does it happen when the game is loading or within the game itself?
- When did it happen? For example, while spinning a slot or winning a specific item?
- Does it happen regularly?
- If possible, please send a screenshot or video of the issue.

If you are experiencing game crashes, reinstalling the game might help, but this should be a last resort.

Does this solve your question?

user_message: It just stops responding in the middle of fights. This started yesterday. I’m playing on Android, and it happens almost every match.
agent_response:
I apologize that your character, ShadowHunter, is freezing during battles on your Android device. It sounds very frustrating that this started yesterday and is happening almost every match.

To help resolve this, please try the following troubleshooting steps:
1. Close all running apps and restart your Android device.
2. Make sure you have the latest update of the game installed.
3. Launch the game again.

If the issue persists after trying these steps, please let me know.

faqs_list.title: General troubleshooting
faqs_list.faq_body: If your game is freezing, crashing, not loading, or behaving irregularly we recommend that you try the following steps: Please close all of you running apps and restart your device. Make sure you have the latest update of the game installed. Launch the game. If your game is still not working properly after following the steps above please contact our Support team. Lastly, please try to include in your message the following answers: When did this issue first start - was it following an update? Does it happen when the game is loading or within the game itself? When did it happen? while spinning a slot? winning a specific item? Does it happen regularly? If possible, please send us a screenshot or a video of your issue. If you’re experiencing game crashes while playing the game, reinstalling the game might help. You can find out how to reinstall the game in this FAQ article . However, note that reinstalling the game should be a last resort.

faqs_list.title: My game got stuck on loading after the update?
faqs_list.faq_body: If the game isn't loading after an update: 1. Restart Your Device: A simple restart often clears up issues that prevent games from loading correctly. 2. Clear Cache/Data: Android: Go to your device's Settings > Apps, locate your game, and clear the cache and data. Clearing data might reset game progress if it's not backed up online. iOS : Settings > General > iPhone Storage, tap on the game, and choose Offload App. 3. Reinstall the App: If other steps don't work, uninstall and reinstall the game. Ensure your progress is backed up before doing this step.

faqs_list.title: Why can’t I update the app?
faqs_list.faq_body: The issues might be caused by a few reasons. First, make sure that your Internet connection is good and updates are not blocked because you’re on 4G/LTE and not on Wi-Fi. Second, make sure that your device has enough storage space to download the update. Another thing is that the app is pending in the queue (the most common issue on Android devices). Follow the steps below to clear the downloading queue: Open Play Store app. Swipe-in from the right edge of the screen, and select My apps & games. Here you’ll see all apps that are currently downloading on your phone. To cancel an app from downloading, select it and touch the X (cross icon) near the download progress bar to cancel download for the app. You can do this for all apps to clear the download queue. After that, please try to update the game again.

Second, make sure that your device has enough storage space to download the update. Another thing is that the app is pending in the queue (the most common issue on Android devices). Follow the steps below to clear the downloading queue: Open Play Store app. Swipe-in from the right edge of the screen, and select My apps & games. Here you’ll see all apps that are currently downloading on your phone. To cancel an app from downloading, select it and touch the X (cross icon) near the download progress bar to cancel download for the app. You can do this for all apps to clear the download queue. After that, please try to update the game again.

faqs_list.title: General troubleshooting
faqs_list.faq_body: If your game is freezing, crashing, not loading, or behaving irregularly we recommend that you try the following steps: Please close all of you running apps and restart your device. Make sure you have the latest update of the game installed. Launch the game. If your game is still not working properly after following the steps above please contact our Support team. Lastly, please try to include in your message the following answers: When did this issue first start - was it following an update? Does it happen when the game is loading or within the game itself? When did it happen? while spinning a slot? winning a specific item? Does it happen regularly? If possible, please send us a screenshot or a video of your issue. If you’re experiencing game crashes while playing the game, reinstalling the game might help. You can find out how to reinstall the game in this FAQ article . However, note that reinstalling the game should be a last resort.

faqs_list.title: My game got stuck on loading after the update?
faqs_list.faq_body: If the game isn't loading after an update: 1. Restart Your Device: A simple restart often clears up issues that prevent games from loading correctly. 2. Clear Cache/Data: Android: Go to your device's Settings > Apps, locate your game, and clear the cache and data. Clearing data might reset game progress if it's not backed up online. iOS : Settings > General > iPhone Storage, tap on the game, and choose Offload App. 3. Reinstall the App: If other steps don't work, uninstall and reinstall the game. Ensure your progress is backed up before doing this step.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PURCHASE OR PAYMENT ISSUE RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps in order for purchase or payment issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by thanking the user for supporting the game and apologize for the inconvenience.
2. If purchase details are missing, request ONLY non-sensitive information, such as:
   - approximate purchase date
   - item name
   - platform or storefront
   - approximate purchase amount
   **Note: Never request or confirm sensitive information or payment credentials.**
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** along with the purchase details can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or errors regarding the purchase.
   DO NOT speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant information is available, perform FAQ search by calling the `get_faqs` tool to see if FAQ results can be used to provide a resolution.
5. If even FAQ results cannot provide any resolution, advise the user to review their bank or app-store transaction history to confirm whether the payment succeeded or failed.
   Do not reference internal systems, knowledge sources, FAQ results or troubleshooting origins.
6. If the transaction/payment was succeeded on the user’s side:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their payment is secure and currently being verified.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If the transaction failed on the user’s side:
   - Reject the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the failure condition.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to construct a user response as respectfully informing the user that no completed purchase is recorded and asking them to check with their payment provider if needed.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (bank details, card numbers, emails, IDs, full names, etc.).
- Never claim access to financial systems or banking records.
- Never confirm root cause unless explicitly supported by validated data.
- Never generalize or guess about loss, refunds, charge status, or timing.
- Never imply certainty about refund or transaction status without confirmation.

user_message: hi i am facing login issue
agent_response:
I apologize for the inconvenience you're experiencing with your login. Thank you for bringing this to my attention.

To help resolve this, please try the following troubleshooting steps on your Mac OS Desktop using Chrome:
1. Restart your device.
2. Clear your browser's cache.
3. Check for any available updates for your Chrome browser.
4. Verify your internet connection is stable.

If the issue persists after trying these steps, please let me know your username or display name and approximately when you first noticed the login issue. Please do not share any passwords or other sensitive information.

text.instruction:
----------------------------------------------------------------
PROFILE OR ACCOUNT RELATED ISSUES RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps INORDER for profile or account related issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by apologizing for the inconvenience and thank the user for bringing the account issue to attention.
2. If missing, request clarification regarding the specific issue type, such as:
   - login failure
   - data loss
   - incorrect progress or level state
   - linking or sync errors
   (Request only the category of issue, not sensitive information.)
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or known conditions related to the account issue.
   Do not speculate or infer beyond what is supported by the data.
4. If no actionable insight is available, request ONLY non-sensitive information that may help understand the account context, such as:
   - username or display name (if safe and already shared by the user)
   - device type or platform
   - approximate time the issue was observed
   (Remind the user not to share passwords, OTPs, payment details, or private credentials. Never ask for them.)
5. Offer basic troubleshooting steps when applicable, such as:
   - restarting the app or device
   - clearing cache (if platform-specific and applicable)
   - checking for available app updates
   - verifying network connection
   (Do not reference internal systems or troubleshooting sources.)
6. If the issue persists after troubleshooting or the user confirms troubleshooting has already been attempted:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.

      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their account data and progress are important and safe, and thank them for their patience and support and that the issue requires deeper investigation.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If issue is resolved through troubleshooting or clarification, resolve the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool with **display_content** tool parameter value as confirming resolution with the user and thanking them for their understanding.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (passwords, OTPs, financial info, full names, emails, etc.).
- Never imply access to internal account management or verification systems.
- Never state with certainty that data is safe unless confirmed by validated information.
- Never provide timelines or guarantees regarding restoration or recovery.
- Never dismiss concerns or minimize user experience.
